author: pgoldstein
msg: Removing "magic strings" by localizing header names in a single class.

author: pgoldstein
msg: Fixed bug #12622 - issue with length limitations inside Oracle JDBC driver.
Thanks to Prince Chellarajan for both raising the issue and submitting the resolution.

author: pgoldstein
msg: Changed an RFC822DateFormat.toString call to a format on a static instance.
Changed a variable name for clarity.

author: pgoldstein
msg: Bug #11916 - James now prints a warning if the postmaster address is not local.

author: pgoldstein
msg: Minor changes to SMTPHandler to avoid unnecessary deprecation warnings.
Introduction of a static RFC822DateFormat for date header formatting to replace call to toString
Introduction of a BufferedReader to replace the DataInputStream when reading lines of characters.
